ConnectTshirtText: With your phone, connect to your Connected T-shirt, and retrieve the current data from it.
CurrentDataText: With this app, you will be able to retrieve the current data of your heart frequency, temperature as well as humidity live and display it on your screen.
CompareDataTitle: Compare your data and find more information
CompareDataText: With the help of graphs, compare all the data from previous dates, and keep track of your numbers.
AboutUsText:
This application has been realized within the framework of the course 645-2 - Project at the University of Applied Sciences of Western Switzerland in order to learn to use Flutter, Firebase and Scrum project management.

Developers :
